_comment_for_supportedCameraVendors: A vendor is supported if its name in a lowercase starts with one of supportedCameraVendors.
_comment_for_supportedCameraModels: If the camera's vendor is not supported than the model is not supported, else
if supportedCameraModels list is empty than the model is supported, else
if a model's name case-insensitively starts with one of supportedCameraModels
than the model is supported, else the model is not supported.

eventTypes.name: Perimeter Intrusion [exclusive]
eventTypes._comment1: PEA is responsible both for Line Crossing and Perimeter Intrusion
eventTypes._comment2: Notification is sent as long as the target keeps moving in the detected area

eventTypes.name: Line Crossing [exclusive]
eventTypes._comment1: PEA is responsible both for Line Crossing and Perimeter Intrusion
eventTypes._comment2: Notification is sent as long as the target keeps moving in the detected area

eventTypes.name: Scene Change
eventTypes._comment: AVD is responsible for all three: Scene Change, Video Blur Detection and Abnormal color detection

eventTypes.name: Video Blur Detection
eventTypes._comment: AVD is responsible for all three: Scene Change, Video Blur Detection and Abnormal color detection

eventTypes.name: Abnormal color detection
eventTypes._comment: AVD is responsible for all three: Scene Change, Video Blur Detection and Abnormal color detection
